price: 36. Mise waxay abuureen samooyinka iyo arlada? Mayee, ma yaqiinsana.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
